description:
Detects file access requests to browser credential stores by uncommon processes.
Could indicate potential attempt of credential stealing.
Requires heavy baselining before usage
author: frack113
false_positives: Legitimate software installed on partitions other than "C:\"
name: Access To Browser Credential Files By Uncommon Application
query: ((((file.path:/.*\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ww][Ee][Bb][Cc][Aa][Cc][Hh][Ee]\\[Ww][Ee][Bb][Cc][Aa][Cc][Hh][Ee][Vv]01\.[Dd][Aa][Tt]/) OR (file.path:(/.*\\[Cc][Oo][Oo][Kk][Ii][Ee][Ss]\.[Ss][Qq][Ll][Ii][Tt][Ee]/ OR /.*[Rr][Ee][Ll][Ee][Aa][Ss][Ee]\\[Kk][Ee][Yy]3\.[Dd][Bb]/ OR /.*[Rr][Ee][Ll][Ee][Aa][Ss][Ee]\\[Kk][Ee][Yy]4\.[Dd][Bb]/ OR /.*[Rr][Ee][Ll][Ee][Aa][Ss][Ee]\\[Ll][Oo][Gg][Ii][Nn][Ss]\.[Jj][Ss][Oo][Nn]/)) OR (file.path:(/.*\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll]\\[Cc][Hh][Rr][Oo][Mm][Ee]\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr]\ [Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Dd][Ee][Ff][Aa][Uu][Ll][Tt]\\[Ll][Oo][Gg][Ii][Nn]\ [Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa].*/ OR /.*\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll]\\[Gg][Oo][Oo][Gg][Ll][Ee]\\[Cc][Hh][Rr][Oo][Mm][Ee]\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr]\ [Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Dd][Ee][Ff][Aa][Uu][Ll][Tt]\\[Nn][Ee][Tt][Ww][Oo][Rr][Kk]\\[Cc][Oo][Oo][Kk][Ii][Ee][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll]\\[Gg][Oo][Oo][Gg][Ll][Ee]\\[Cc][Hh][Rr][Oo][Mm][Ee]\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr]\ [Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll]\ [Ss][Tt][Aa][Tt][Ee].*/))) AND (NOT (((process.executable.text:System AND process.parent.executable.text:Idle)) OR (process.executable:(/[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\ \([Xx]86\)\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Ww][Oo][Ww]64\\.*/))))) AND (NOT (((process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\ [Dd][Ee][Ff][Ee][Nn][Dd][Ee][Rr]\\.*/ AND process.executable:(/.*\\[Mm][Pp][Cc][Oo][Pp][Yy][Aa][Cc][Cc][Ee][Ll][Ee][Rr][Aa][Tt][Oo][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Mm][Ss][Mm][Pp][Ee][Nn][Gg]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/))) OR (process.executable:(/.*\\[Tt][Hh][Oo][Rr]64\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Tt][Hh][Oo][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) OR (process.parent.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Mm][Ss][Ii][Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/))))
